segments.text: Hey , Brad . How was your day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty good . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait . We have to return to our homeroom and wait to be dismissed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our homeroom teacher has to take attendance again to make sure that we're all here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So he takes attendance once in the morning and once in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I'm going to my locker to get my jacket . Catch you later .
segments.speaker: S2
